entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 11:16 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
